venue.name: Wild Rover Bar Boston - 1 Block from Faneuil Hall

item.description:
PLEASE DO NOT DOUBLE RSVP! ----PLEASE RSVP IN ONE GROUP ONLY!!


Time for anotherMix +Mingle Meetup Private Party for 200 members at theWILD ROVER (at the edge of Faneuil Hall) at 61 Chatham St. Boston, MA. Its at the corners of Commercial and Chatham ST next to Hong Kong Restaurant.Website: http://www.wildroverboston.com/ ----- Tel (857) 263-8715


WILD ROVER 2nd floor holds about 200 people. We’ll have our own awesome DJ, craxy fun dance floor, bathrooms, appetizers, 2 bar areas, etc. We have arranged an open buffet of apps/food from 7PM till 9PM of the following: Chicken+hot Buffalo fingers, pizza, cheese quesadillas, vegetable trays with veggie dip, cheese and crackers, ETC....so enjoy this great food.

Note: It will be quite from 7 to 9PM so members will have quite time to chat. After 9PM the dancing + loud music starts. Please do not complain, since members come to dance to music after 9PM. If the 2nd floor gets too full we'll open the Basement up so Members can go to the Basement to chat.


There is free KARAOKE on the first floor for us if you want to kick it KARAOKE style!
*******************************************************************
Now the best part!!!...If you come in between 7 and 8PM you will get 1 free drink tickets good for any beer, any wine, and lots of mixed drinks!(Sorry no shots or top-shelf liquor i.e., Patron, etc.). This 1 Drink ticket will expire at 8:15PM sharp!!

Please don't forget to TIP your bartender on your free drink!


When you get there just head upstairs, (please do not block the stairway or doorway) there will be a private party sign up. Then meet/greet Biagio or ALEX. Please clearly say your first name, what group you are with, and pay with a $10 bill in hand at the top of the stairs (no $1 or $5 bills, please). We will be giving you a colored wrist bands to mark who is already in so you can go upstairs and downstairs.


1.I (Biagio) have hired (ALEX) to collect money so I can for talk to all our wonderful members and spend time with my girlfriend too! :-P
2. Everyone, but the invited Larger Meetup Group Head Organizers, pays $10 cash.
3. After 9 p.m. you will have to pay another cover charge to the bar, so stretch your dollar and come before 9PM. If you get in before 9PM you ONLY have to pay $10 to Biagio.
4. If you come after 7:30PM you might not get in right away and you will have to wait downstairs with the waitlisters. This always happens so its another reason to come early!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Invited Meetup Groups so far are:
1. Social Fun http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun (Confirmed by Biagio)
2. Girls just want to have FUN http://www.meetup.com/FUNgirls/ (Confirmed by Sarah)

3. Fun with Alcohol http://www.meetup.com/fun-with-alcohol/events/55264212/ (Confirmed by Dave)

4. The New to Boston Meetup Group 20's - early 30's http://www.meetup.com/The-New-to-Boston-Meetup-Group/ (Confirmed by Lauren)

5. Boston Singles: http://www.meetup.com/BostonSingles/ (Confirmed by Matt)

6. Singles Geeks, Nerds and Professional: (Confirmed by Alison) http://www.meetup.com/Professional-Geeky-Singles/

7. Boston Volunteers -Boston's most popular volunteer Meetup http://www.meetup.com/bigenoughtodeliver/ (confirmed by Josh)

8. Red Sox Natives http://www.meetup.com/natives/ (confirmed by Isabel + Frank)

9. Boston Happy Hour http://www.meetup.com/nightlife-421/ (confirmed byIsabel)

10. Boston Euro Social Meetup Group http://www.meetup.com/euro-76/(confirmed by Noelle)

Looking to add 1-2 more big groups.... so let me know soon!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We normally have 220 members at these Mix and Mingle parties. I hope you can all join us for this blast of a party. It should be fun so thanks and enjoy life!..........Ciao, Biagio and Josh

 

The Boston Volunteers

Big enough to deliver, small enough to care

Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

 

P.S. Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers:
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have the private room exclusively for us. I'll provide my cell # for your convenience. :)

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Boston Mix + Mingle (M&M) Party for Multiple Meetup Groups
